Stomps your balls with high heels as it stabs you in your anus, yet when it finally rewards you with a stroke on your schnauzer - it's like no other feeling in the world. You keep coming back from more, nuts cracked and backside aching. Most times it leaves you wanting and depressed, but other times it gives you pleasure unbeaten by any other experience. 

10/10 would get my balls crushed again, just to taste that sweat savory fruit of ecstasy.
